### section_xz_1var { #scahpy.plots.sections.section_xz_1var }

```python
plots.sections.section_xz_1var(
    da,
    *,
    lat,
    levels,
    cmap='thermal',
    time=None,
    month=None,
    title=None,
    colorbar_label=None,
    output_path=None,
)
```

Plot an X–Z vertical section at a fixed latitude (lon vs vertical).

#### Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name           | Type              | Description                                                            | Default     |
|----------------|-------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------|
| da             | xarray.DataArray  | Scalar variable with coordinates (time\|month?, z, lat, lon).          | _required_  |
| lat            | float             | Fixed latitude at which the section is extracted (nearest selection).  | _required_  |
| levels         | iterable of float | Discrete color levels for the filled section.                          | _required_  |
| cmap           | str               | cmocean colormap name (lightened internally).                          | `'thermal'` |
| time           | int or str        | Select a single `time` frame if available (index or timestamp string). | `None`      |
| month          | int               | Select a single `month` if available (1–12) for climatologies.         | `None`      |
| title          | str               | Figure title.                                                          | `None`      |
| colorbar_label | str               | Label for the colorbar; defaults to `da.units` if present.             | `None`      |
| output_path    | str or None       | If provided, the figure is saved; otherwise it is shown.               | `None`      |

### section_xz_1var_winds { #scahpy.plots.sections.section_xz_1var_winds }

```python
plots.sections.section_xz_1var_winds(
    da,
    U,
    W,
    *,
    lat,
    levels,
    cmap='thermal',
    time=None,
    month=None,
    w_scale=1000.0,
    quiver_density=4,
    quiver_scale=170.0,
    quiverkey_speed=5.0,
    title=None,
    colorbar_label=None,
    output_path=None,
)
```

Plot an X–Z section (fixed latitude) of a scalar field and overlay wind vectors (U, W).

#### Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name            | Type              | Description                                                                                | Default     |
|-----------------|-------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------|
| da              | xarray.DataArray  | Scalar field (time\|month?, z, lat, lon).                                                  | _required_  |
| U               | xarray.DataArray  | Zonal wind component on the same grid (time\|month?, z, lat, lon).                         | _required_  |
| W               | xarray.DataArray  | Vertical wind component on the same grid; will be scaled by `w_scale`.                     | _required_  |
| lat             | float             | Fixed latitude for the section (nearest selection).                                        | _required_  |
| levels          | iterable of float | Discrete color levels for the filled section.                                              | _required_  |
| cmap            | str               | cmocean colormap name (lightened internally).                                              | `'thermal'` |
| time            | optional          | Uniform temporal selector applied to all inputs.                                           | `None`      |
| month           | optional          | Uniform temporal selector applied to all inputs.                                           | `None`      |
| w_scale         | float             | Multiplicative factor for W (e.g., 1000 to convert m/s to mm/s for better visual balance). | `1000.0`    |
| quiver_density  | int               | Subsampling step for the quiver field (larger -> fewer arrows).                            | `4`         |
| quiver_scale    | float             | Matplotlib quiver scaling parameter.                                                       | `170.0`     |
| quiverkey_speed | float             | Reference speed (m/s) shown in the quiver key.                                             | `5.0`       |
| title           | Optional\[str\]   | See `section_xz_1var`.                                                                     | `None`      |
| colorbar_label  | Optional\[str\]   | See `section_xz_1var`.                                                                     | `None`      |
| output_path     | Optional\[str\]   | See `section_xz_1var`.                                                                     | `None`      |

#### Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type   | Description   |
|--------|--------|---------------|
|        | None   |               |
